No Case

[![NPM version][npm-image]][npm-url] [![NPM downloads][downloads-image]][downloads-url] [![Bundle size][bundlephobia-image]][bundlephobia-url]

Transform into a lower cased string with spaces between words.

Installation

npm install no-case --save

Usage

import { noCase } from "no-case";

noCase("string"); //=> "string"
noCase("dot.case"); //=> "dot case"
noCase("PascalCase"); //=> "pascal case"
noCase("version 1.2.10"); //=> "version 1 2 10"

The function also accepts options.

License
